Entry.JapaneseText: ひとりで暮らしてると、客が来るのが待ち遠しいって 工場で一緒だったおっちゃんが言ってたな。
Entry.EnglishText: An older guy I used to work with at the factory told me that when you live by yourself, you'll be eager for company.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっかー。じゃあ、またニノンさんのところにも 遊びに行ってあげなきゃネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Is that so? Well, we'll have to stop by and hang out with Ninon again.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、客が帰ってひとりになった時は それにも増して寂しいものだ。
Entry.EnglishText: But being by yourself after a guest leaves makes one even more lonely.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう言えば、<Eugene>もボクと暮らす前は ずっとひとりだったんだよネ……
Entry.EnglishText: That reminds me, you were always by yourself before we started living together...
